hero's assist.name: Hero's Assist
hero's assist.desc: Heroes come to your aid based on your Saint Stance.

oath: saintsworn.name: Oath: Saintsworn
oath: saintsworn.desc: A vow to the fallen heroes. Press L to swap to Saintsblade.

saint's synergy.name: Saint's Synergy
saint's synergy.desc: 25% of your highest element scaling is applied to other elemental damage.

ether proselyte.name: Ether Proselyte
ether proselyte.desc: All of your Elemental Mantras below Lv. 5 are 1 Mantra Level higher. Your Mantras are converted to the element of your active stance.

saint's negation.name: Saint's Negation
saint's negation.desc: Once per stance cycle you can fully block an attack that matches your Saint Stance.

saint's overload.name: Saint's Overload
saint's overload.desc: After a full rotation of stances your elemental scaling is increased by 15% and Mantra Modifiers [are] increased by 10%.
